title: Bud Light to Launch Hard Soda
sub_head: Brewers and soda companies are creating drinks on each otherâ€™s turf in search of growth
body:
The line between beer and soda is blurring.
Anheuser-Busch InBev SA said it is introducing in January a line of Bud Light-branded hard soda in cola, cherry cola, orange and lemon-lime flavors.
